In a Grim Hollow campaign, characters have access to rules that represent the pull of evil power on them. Sangromancy magic offers great power, at a great price. Curses fly as readily as arrows or bolts. Most impactful are the transformations, changing the characters in dramatic and dark ways.
If the campaign is accepting of characters that turn into monsters as play progresses, then there's no reason to think that creatures considered monsters can't get in on the fun!

entries.name: Making Monsters Work
entries: Monsters and monstrous species can undoubtedly be fun to play as characters. They offer not only new and different game mechanics, but players can tell unique and dramatic stories with them.

For these types of characters to work, however, communication among the gamemaster and players is vital. Bugbears, gnolls, or morbus kobolds walking into a rural village—or even a major city—might be a cause of great concern for many. If expectations are not set ahead of time, this could cause problems in a campaign.
Having monstrous characters confronted once or twice might be a fun roleplaying session. Having such a conflict occur every session gets repetitive and tedious. So how does a group handle this?

If there is just one monstrous character in a party, the rest of the party can vouch for the untrusted member of their group. Even better, provide a home base for the party where such characters are not just accepted, but they are welcomed. A town like this, set on the dangerous edge of civilization, can be a great setting for a campaign.

entries.name: Bugbear
entries: 在与埃萨里斯（Etharis）的民众互动时，大多数巨鬼都感染了被称为{@disease Tormach's Rage|GHMG}的诅咒疾病。这使得任何人看到他们在可怕的狂暴攻击中时，都感到恐惧。
强大的魔法、神圣的干预，以及其他不寻常的情况，可能会治愈一只(`bugbear`)病症。这些被治愈的个体，意识到他们先前的处境以及疾病在身体和精神上带来的影响，对生活有了新的看法。当然，他们选择如何利用摆脱疾病控制的自由，取决于每只(`bugbear`)。
有些人可能会寻找自己的同类，希望找到尚未被疾病侵袭的(goblin bears)群体。然而，这样的情况非常罕见。更有可能的是，这些(goblin bears)，在经历变化后，试图加入社会以实现他们的目标。

entries.name: Bugbear Traits
entries: {@disease Tormach's Rage|GHMG}的巨魔熊从{@disease Tormach's Rage|GHMG}的灾祸中痊愈后，保留了一些凶猛性，但也因此经历发生了改变。

entries.name: Faevlin
entries: 逃离精灵境界让你感到无所不能，尤其是当你的目标涉及狡诈、诡计或欺诈时。
你看待世界的方式与其他生物大不相同，主要是因为你的头颕是颠倒的。保持下巴抬起对你来说从来不是问题！
你总是左顾右盼，因为你欺骗的精灵力量可能会寻求报复。获得力量会让这种情况变得更加困难。

entries.name: Faevlin Traits
entries: Faevlin将他们在凡间表亲的狡诈与从精灵之地渗入你身体的魔法相结合。

entries.name: Monsters, Ability Scores and Alignment
entries: Individuals are unique, and the characters in your game take that uniqueness to a whole new level. The traits presented in this chapter reflect the average characters of this monster's type. Aspects of the character—specifically ability score increases and alignment—should be flexible during character creation. Players and DMs should talk before a campaign starts to agree on the best choices for the story they're hoping to tell.

entries.name: Gnoll
entries: 你曾经是以太瑞斯（Etharis）的另一个人形生物，过着和其他人一样的生活。然后{@book Great Beast|GHMG|1|The Great Beast}来到了你的家园。野兽腐化的魔法不仅改变了你的生活，也改变了你的本质。你变成了一个疯狂的怪物，一个长着鬣狗头的杀手，你的头脑中充满了一种让你越来越沉溺于无尽血腥欲望的存在。
然后，有一天，突然间，那阵噼啪声停止了。你的身体仍然保持着腐化的形态，一只毛茸茸、看起来吓人的野兽，但你的意识恢复到了之前的状态。自从{@book Great Beast|GHMG|1|The Great Beast}的变异压倒了你，你无法记起发生了什么，但你还记得变异之前的生活。拥有新的怪物形态却保留之前的意识，生活肯定会带你去很多有趣的地方。

entries.name: Gnoll Traits
entries: 逃脱了{@book Great Beast|GHMG|1|The Great Beast}的枷锁的豺狼人保留了一些野兽的能力，但重新获得了他们的记忆和原始个性。

entries.name: Grudgel
entries: 尽管在一个早晨迷迷糊糊地醒来时不记得自己的生活是令人困惑的，但你的族人们非常足智多谋、头脑清晰。在以太瑞斯（Etharis）的早期日子里，你的身体形态让以太瑞斯较温和的居民心生恐惧，这让你的生活并不轻松。一些人从祖先口中听说过像你这样的生物是邪恶而残忍的传说。
但你既不是，你的乐于助人和平和的态度帮助周围的人找到了自己在世界上的位置。然而，在很少有格鲁吉尔人迁徙的地区，恐惧仍然是你看到他人的第一反应。

entries.name: Grudgel Traits
entries: 怨怒者在他们的努力中既有智慧又有力量。

entries.name: Morbus Kobold
entries: 你的人民与你的(狗头人)族人分开进化，受到操纵疾病和传播它们的化合物的危险做法的推动。你的蹼手和蹼脚使你成为一名优秀的游泳者，但是你的知识才是让你与众不同的地方。
你的文化教会了你很多关于疾病和罕见成分的知识，这些成分可能会传播或治愈这些疾病。尽管传播疾病的族人对世界的愿景清晰而丑陋，但你却有其他想法。这些想法可能驱使你离开了你的家族，让你置身于一个起初觉得你很奇怪的世界。但是，你对困扰世界的疾病的了解使你处于一个独特的位置，可以提供帮助。

entries.name: Morbus Kobold Traits
entries: 病垢怪兽（Morbus kobolds）掌握疾病和自然物质的知识，他们既可以利用它们造福，也可以利用它们作恶。

entries.name: Monsters as PCs Trinket Table
entries: Just as playing a monstrous character comes with different narrative possibilities and mechanical expressions, so too should it come with different trinkets. The trinket table on this page is meant to supplement the {@table Grim Hollow Trinket Table|GHPG|trinket table in the Grim Hollow Players Guide}.
This table can also be used to add some flavorful (and disturbing items) to decorate a monster's lair, or to add something unique to a monster's equipment or treasure hoard.

{@style The Monster Grimoire|dnd-font;small-caps}
{@style Afraid of the Dark?|dnd-font;small-caps}
{@style What Hides Within is Worse...|dnd-font;small-caps}

The dark and dangerous world Of Etharis, home to the Grim Hollow fantasy setting, challenges all who live there. And the deadliest challenges to those who trod the adventuring roads of Etharis are the terrifying, bizarre, and fantastical beasts who lurk in the shadows or tower over the cities. Corrupted humanoids bent and twisted by otherworldly forces, enervating undead seeking to snuff out the light of life, malicious fey pursuing their own devious and capricious ends, putrid aberrations serving masters imprisoned in realities beyond the mortal realm: these forces, and more, challenge those seeking peace and prosperity in a hostile world.

Grim Hollow: The Monster Grimoire offers over 400 new monsters, tailor-made for a dark fantasy campaign. The foes detailed in this supplement, ranging from capricious fey to corrupt fiends, can fit nicely into any 5e campaign where the players are looking for a devious and deadly challenge. The monster lore and statistics are just the beginning. Each monster comes with suggested salvage! Monster entries detail methods that characters might use to harvest monster parts to turn into equipment or magic items. Additional material discusses creating characters from some of the monsters, using them to their utmost tactical and narrative potential, and running intelligent monsters as intelligently as possible.
All this and more await you within this copy of Grim Hollow: The Monster Grimoire.
